apis.name: List wiki pages
apis.description: List all wiki pages for a given group.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: with_content
attributes.description: Include pages’ content

response.content: Here is an instruction how to deploy this project.
response.title: deploy

response.content: Our development process is described here.
response.title: development

apis.name: Get a wiki page
apis.description: Get a wiki page for a given group.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: slug
attributes.description: URL-encoded slug (a unique string) of the wiki page, such as dir%2Fpage_name

attributes.name: render_html
attributes.description: Return the rendered HTML of the wiki page

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Wiki page version sha

apis.name: Create a new wiki page
apis.description: Create a new wiki page for the given repository with the given title, slug, and content.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: The content of the wiki page

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the wiki page

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: The format of the wiki page. Available formats are: markdown (default), rdoc, asciidoc and org

apis.name: Edit an existing wiki page
apis.description: Update an existing wiki page. At least one parameter is required to update the wiki page.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: The content of the wiki page

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the wiki page

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: The format of the wiki page. Available formats are: markdown (default), rdoc, asciidoc and org

attributes.name: slug
attributes.description: URL encoded slug (a unique string) of the wiki page. Ex. dir%2Fpage_name

apis.name: Delete a wiki page
apis.description: Delete a wiki page with a given slug.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: slug
attributes.description: URL-encoded slug (a unique string) of the wiki page, such as dir%2Fpage_name

apis.name: Upload an attachment to the wiki repository
apis.description: Upload a file to the attachment folder inside the wiki’s repository. The attachment folder is the uploads folder.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: The attachment to be uploaded

attributes.name: branch
attributes.description: The name of the branch. Defaults to the wiki repository default branch
